website_summaries.verdict: These tear-resistant bags have wider-than-average mouths, so it's easier to get the contents in and out.
pros: Wide openings make it easier to take things in and out
Keeps UV light out of bag
cons: Zipping system does not work for long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these to hide the smell of that devils lettuce and let me tell you, it does the job! I even stored my pipe in a second bag and cant smell anything!
customer_reviews.author: Javas Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Price isn't always the best factor.
customer_reviews.text: Not air tight so not smell proof. They were priced really well which raised a flag from the start, but once I test one, well I found out why. I really just wanted something that worked, so went a different route. If you want bags for privacy, these are amazing. If you want bags to be smell proof, I personally did, and would suggest you go a different route.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Smith

customer_reviews.title: Odorproof and opaque
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it works. I'm actually using this not to hide my stash or to keep herbs fresh. I'm actually using it to pack out TP when I go backpacking. Leave No Trace! And it works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Nakano

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers, Not Smell Proof
customer_reviews.text: This did not live up to the reviews. I bought it initially because the description says it was smell proof. However, the zippers do not provide an airtight seal. After only a couple hours, the smell already started seeping through. Thankfully, I tested this at home before I brought it out in public. I tried to reseal the package and the zipper broke after the second time. Will NOT buy again. There are better products out there
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hu

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. They really work. I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. They really work. I can smell odors that others can't and I can't smell a thing from these bags. Now if you have residue on your fingers when you close the bag you might smell something.
customer_reviews.author: Sandstorm

customer_reviews.title: This do not work.
customer_reviews.text: This bags do not work at all. I put a Slim Jim in them. I can smell through the bag. But I bought a smell proof bag and when i put it in the bag, my dog didnt even smell it. The big pouches work but not plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tasja

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpackers.
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent bags. I bought them to store used toilet paper while backpacking. They concealed any smell and kept you from seeing what in there. They are small lightweight and easy to pack and carry. For what I used them for they were great.
customer_reviews.author: rhufste

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow definitely impressed by these bags. Was a little skeptical for how cheap it was, but damn do they hide the smell good. They’re on the smaller side but that could be good for putting your goods in a bunch then putting the bags in a larger ziplock bag for extra smell proof. Lemme say that I have some SMELLY herbs and these bags hide it almost completely. Not as good as vacuum sealed bags obviously but for what it is it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sort of smell proof
customer_reviews.text: To a certain extent it’s smellproof but that’s cause I also have my stuff in a smell proof big container, but it works better then I was expecting, just bought it to try it out and actually would recommend to keep the smell to a minimum
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Bags work well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing or transporting odiferous medications. The bags work really well for smells or leaks. Excellent for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like A Great Purchase To Me!
customer_reviews.text: Strong, easy to open and close and keeps its seal nice and tight. What more could I ask for in a baggie like this. I store Medical MJ (various strains) in different bags, and each strain releases a distinct smell when I open the bag. And I do mean release, because the bags do EXACTLY what they claim...they contain the odor (and extend the freshness) of the plant for as long as I need. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: blogzilly

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Had my product in a ziplock freezer bag then sealed it in one of these bags. These bags work very well at concealing smell. The bags are quite thick so they seem durable. I am happy with my purchace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold the smell as much as I’d like
customer_reviews.text: This product sort of works but after a while the smell starts to come through the bag. It works for some things but if you’re trying to put something extra smelly in it and need it to not smell at all, I’m not sure these baggies are right for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE NOT USED THESE FOR SMELLY STUFF YET. ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT USED THESE FOR SMELLY STUFF YET. BUT I HAVE USED FOR STORAGE OF MY 0XYGEN ABSORBERS. QUICKER, AND EASIER TO DO. AND THEY SEEM TO LAST LONGER, BEACAUSE OF DARK POUCH. THANKS, ENJOYING USING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Mae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The bags are a very good size for a variety of items. I used them to protect items I want to protect from dogs and other animals. They work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: starling01

customer_reviews.title: Very study and well made
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be Very study and well made. I was able fit about 3/4 ounce of decent size buds. It might hold 1 oz of small buds and still seal though you couldn't heat seal it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smellproof and see proof!
customer_reviews.text: Works great Wide opening much easier for opening, closing and usage. Black color keeps contents hidden. Hides smell of whatever you Put into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Maddox

customer_reviews.title: rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I put a bag inside a bag just incase, the lining for the part that suppose to close rips very easily so your bound to go thru a few. it does encase the smell very well, but not to the point where id trust it to not double bag my stuff. my only issue was how easily it rips when trying to open it, imagine being away and your bag rips and you didn't bring backup.
customer_reviews.author: De'Onna

customer_reviews.title: Zip unglues after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This is not made for repeated use. Its zip unglues after a few uses, after which the bag has to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robot

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Was bought as a birthday gift for my friend and I can't wait to give it to him. Happy Birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sealable bags.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for storing my pipe tobacco. Great travel pouches.
customer_reviews.author: S. Borden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A must for anyone that needs to contain tobacco, etc. Works as advertised...
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Lar

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The seal easily comes unglued from the siding. This has happened on 5/6 bags so far- four where on the first or second time opening.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Upshaw

customer_reviews.title: Works for more than you think
customer_reviews.text: Found this to store light sensitive bottles of medication. Couldn't find any better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Fulbright

customer_reviews.title: Zip Lock pulls apart from bag
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the zip lock apart to open the bag, the ZIP lock stayed together and pulled apart from one side of the bag which kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you might think from the measurement
customer_reviews.text: Says 6x4" but slightly less than 6...and of the 4" only 2.5 useable, so PD small.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Block the smells but squirrels found it and ripped the package
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane de Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags
customer_reviews.text: Great little bags, they keep the smell in and the freshness too. Would buy these again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Leshyie

customer_reviews.title: Good bag completely smell proff no smells leak out for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bag completely smell proff no smells leak out for the 15 pack deal perfectly reasonable and the only smell is what ever is left over on your hands while you close the bag ill deffinatly come back and buy from this company again great service great product great prices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! Good seal, thick walled, and keeps the smell of my tobacco enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn

customer_reviews.title: Does the intended jon of minimizing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Excellent communication on tracking. Seems to do the job of minimizing smells. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Izofizandm

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and works quite well to hide even the strongest of odors.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleP

customer_reviews.title: they work.
customer_reviews.text: they work. a little smaller than I expected inside, so order large.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: works well, don't think I would trust the dog sniffer .
customer_reviews.author: mark Ostrowsky

customer_reviews.title: Very good seller
customer_reviews.text: Worked as I expected. A+A+A+A+A+ seller would buy from again. Bags were small should have read my fault though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great!!! Really keep the smell inside..I recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: the wide opening on these bags is great for fitting larger bulkier pieces, I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Smshocker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but only issue being I ordered the incorrect ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but only issue being I ordered the incorrect size and they were too small for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Genovese

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps smells out very well but doesnt last more than a month or two of repeated use. Although for the price and quantity that’s not really a problem. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a rebuy for me
customer_reviews.text: Bags work great if you don't get anything on the zip part or above
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Durable and smell proof!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are totally smell proof, discreet, and most importantly, durable even with repeated use. Will always use these bags in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J Y F

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely legit product!!! They say it's smell proof! It's 100'% spot on. Nobody knows I have anything!!!
customer_reviews.author: shaun gallant

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags wish they didn't have a logo on them already.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I use them for my spiritual baths I sell. They're perfect. I may change them however because of the logo already on them.
customer_reviews.author: I Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product..
customer_reviews.text: Good product.. Just a suggestion, but add a line of super glue along the top edge to ensure it stays sealed.. Other than that, no smell..
customer_reviews.author: Sean Falbee

customer_reviews.title: Great value, does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect concealment. Pretty thick and durable, not 100% smell proof under stress, but as long as it doesn’t get squished or a lot of pressure applied, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Loudaboutit

customer_reviews.title: Not smell proof
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really thin and flimsy compared to others on the market. They are dark so will keep light out but they do not hide smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great and do the job making sure my house doesn't smell like herbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: As a test, I hide some peanut butter in one of the bags and hid it out of sight of my Golden Retriever. He found it in less than 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When you need to ship stuff that needs not be known about. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Wish they came in a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Wish they came in a bigger size. I use them to hold pipe tobacco, which comes in 1.76 oz tins. One of these will hold about 1oz, so I need two (very tightly stuffed) bags per tin.
customer_reviews.author: JimminyJam

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works well! Good deal for number of bags included.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J.

customer_reviews.title: These absolutely work!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought different kinds and these are the best! 100% scent proof
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works really really well just have to make sure it is 100% closed!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: bags seal just fine
customer_reviews.text: they keep the smell in and work just fine for what i need them for
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really smell proof an fits nicely an closes well.
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: These actually work just wish they were a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: bankhead

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking though but that’s not why I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not smell proof. Nice looking though but that’s not why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Phi808

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Perfect size, perfect protection! Blends in well with other such bags and definitely holds in the smell. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: ranoaldo davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stop the smell
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. These do not keep smells out at all. I’ve tried more than one type of ‘spice’ and you can totally smell them.
customer_reviews.author: s. hutto

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% smell proof
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find these to be very smell proof at all.
customer_reviews.author: adrianna diguglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Good size, price and # of bags included
customer_reviews.text: Good size, price and # of bags included. Looks very sleek and mysterious ;P. I am happy with the product and the shipping time. The ziplock is solid. Too bad I can't throw some coffee inside.
customer_reviews.author: Virgi

customer_reviews.title: It's In The Bag
customer_reviews.text: These work remarkably well, even with some rather fragrant contents. Left one in my car in the hot sun for an entire afternoon and still couldn't smell a thing. That said, zipper closure seems pretty strong. Solid black color's the way to go. Also fits great in just about any backpack or jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: mike white

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to store my spices in an easy organized fashion! Will keep them fresh for much longer and I don't have jars all over my kitchen! 30 bags used. another 15 to go! I'll probably order more and keep some on hand for backups just in case they wear out from use. But I don't see that happening anytime soon. These bags feel very thick and sturdy. I have a feeling they will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Won't fool even a dog with a bad cold
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you're planning on using these for, just be clear that they most certainly do not prevent odors from escaping. I can still smell things I put in, and as a scientist, I'm super careful not to cross-contaminate, using gloves and one person to hold the bag open while the other fills it up with the materials, keeping things away from the zipper folds, etc. etc.. If it's pilot error, then it must take Neil Armstrong. I've even double-bagged and that's at least a little less noticeable. But if you place the sealed bags in a ziploc and a day or two later open the ziploc, you're presented with a very strong odor of the items in the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gulf Coast Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Able to keep strong, skunky odors contained without so much as an errant sniff of what is contained within. The size is good to hold around an ounce of plant matter, although you could fit in more, probably closer to 2 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seal!  True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to travel with protein powder, tea, ground cinnamon and ground clove. Fantastic, tight seal, so no protein powder leaked during travel! Love these bags and the solid dark color keeps protein and teas fresh. I like the condensed packing of this bag. If you travel a lot, you really could carry any type of powder in these bags, including laundry soap or Oxi clean - a small enough bag, but definitely would have enough for multiple loads! Could carry other supplements in these bags or make-up. They seem like an all-around great bag I use to condense items for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Lioness Light

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and Incredible customer service
customer_reviews.text: These bags are thick and sturdy. They are not like the other brands posted here (thin an easily torn). These are superior in every way. The company's customer service is unheard of- They are on top of every issue. Emails are returned in less than 24 hours. These people are here to help you. The company and the product is highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: sewlikemom

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Durable but Still Smell Contents
customer_reviews.text: These work very well as bags and do keep down the scent of its contents. I keep different pipe tobacco in them but can still smell it from a few feet away. I wiped the outsides of the bags for any residue but it didnt help. Far better than any traditional bag and very durable but not quite there when it comes to more potent contents.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel384

customer_reviews.title: Smellproof, discreet!
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly too small for my blacktie grinder. I was able to barely seal the bag, will order a larger size next time but loved the smell proof aspect and subtle black bag
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Failed on first use
customer_reviews.text: First one I used, first day I received them failed. Trying out the bag I sealed one, when I reopened the bag the plastic zipper that is glued to the bag separated from the bag rendering the bag useless.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. StewartTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Yes, they do work!
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely did the trick while traveling. I used one much more frequently than the others, and the zip peeled away from the bag. But, you could still fold the opening and roll it up, and accomplish zero odor escape.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Defective zipper closure
customer_reviews.text: The smell proof quality is Excellent..........but The zipper detached on several so far when opening it, which takes the “smell proof” quality away.
customer_reviews.author: JillM

customer_reviews.title: Great and convenient reusable product.
customer_reviews.text: These really do keep oder in and are a convenient way to store your smelly goods.
customer_reviews.author: Filip

customer_reviews.title: Sealed and Scentless! The Perfect Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Absolutely no odors escape from them! Tight seal across the top! Everyone I have shared these bags with is crazy about them.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Ross

customer_reviews.title: no complaints what so ever
customer_reviews.text: these work quite well. great for medications, etc. super affordable and 1 easy to use. no smell what so ever ^_~ thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: You can put the most smelly thing in these bags and it covers the smell.
customer_reviews.author: JD Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: The ziplock feature on these wear out quickly making its ...
customer_reviews.text: The ziplock feature on these wear out quickly making its purpose pointless if you can't even close it. So if you will be opening and closing them frequently, don't bother. Although you do get 15 of them so plenty of backup I guess.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Concealed odors
customer_reviews.text: The wide opening made it very easy to use and it concealed all odors. Nothing ate my snacks and perfect to put your cigarette butts in
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down!
customer_reviews.text: The whole point is to not smell the contents inside right?!! 👎🏾👎🏾 I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: shannon hester

customer_reviews.title: so far so good..
customer_reviews.text: as far as durability and size and keeping smell out, so far so good...can't say if it's legit dog proof or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and as described. Just what I needed. Smooth transaction too.
customer_reviews.author: David Lilly

customer_reviews.title: No smell and I like the fact that they are dark
customer_reviews.text: Bags were exactly what I expected and arrived quickly which was key as I was traveling. No smell and I like the fact that they are dark.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: They do what they’re intended to do but I wish they weren’t so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: InkdFaTaLiTy

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: These bags are smaller than expected however they work great for what i intended them to be used for. The really do keep the smell of things hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Very durable, using over and over. No smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: SuperFly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal ** wink wink.
customer_reviews.text: These work extremely well !!! Can’t smell a thing !!! Nice size too. Roomy !!! Holds a bunch. A fluffy bunch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this does the trick. The cheese in the fridge is ruining everything.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK M MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bags keep the scent and freshness of food in while keeping degrading uv light out

customer_reviews.title: No Dogs allowed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed to get the dogs from smelling my treats!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does good job on keep smell in, not totally but better than most.

customer_reviews.title: they aren't easily hidden. But overall
customer_reviews.text: The bags are larger than I had expected, they aren't easily hidden. But overall, the product is good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for discretion when we are traveling.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: These bags are truly odor proof, made of strong flexible plastic, and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: They do block out odors as described. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: These things are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags to transport rotten livers for fishing. As long as my hands are clean you don't smell a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof?
customer_reviews.text: They are a workable size and seal tightly. But I can positively say not smell proof.
customer_reviews.author: SkallyWag

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof bag
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not air tight so the smell still comes out. Bags seem small but they are the size stated. They are good for tobacco.

customer_reviews.title: 💙💙💙
customer_reviews.text: Can not smell anything threw these bags so worth it!!!!

product_meta.title: Smell Proof Bags (15-Pack) - 4x6 Inch, Unique Wide Opening - Perfect Bag/Sack/Baggies to Keep Odor In, No Matter How Smelly It Is - By IMPRESA
product_meta.description:
TESTED, TRUSTED AND BACKED BY OUR TOP-RATED WARRANTY AND CUSTOMER SERVICE! 

PERFECT FOR SMELL PROOF STORAGE: Our 15-pack of smell proof bags are perfect for storage of a variety of items without odors or moisture getting in or out - perfect for keeping herbs, spices and other food items fresh and flavorful 

BUILT FOR DEMANDING USE: Tear-resistant and equipped with a heavy-duty zipper, our bags' black color also keeps UV light out of the bags - perfect for products that degrade with UV light 

GREAT FOR BACKPACKING: Perfect for camping and hiking trips - stash flavorful food and spices in our container without giving off odors and keep smelly items sealed up tight! With our bags, no bear, squirrel or skunk will pay your food any attention, no matter how much of a stink it raises 

WELL-SIZED: Measures 6.5" wide x 5.5" tall - usable interior space of 6" x 4". Just the right size sack - not too large, not too small

BUILT FOR DEMANDING USE: Tear-resistant and equipped with a heavy-duty zipper, our bags' black color also keeps UV light out of the bags - perfect for products that degrade with UV light

GREAT FOR BACKPACKING: Perfect for camping and hiking trips - stash flavorful food and spices in our container without giving off odors and keep smelly items sealed up tight! With our bags, no bear, squirrel or skunk will pay your food any attention, no matter how much of a stink it raises
WELL-SIZED: Measures 6.5" wide x 5.5" tall - usable interior space of 6" x 4". Just the right size sack - not too large, not too small
